EntryName	LRC39_HUMAN
ProteinName	Leucine-rich repeat-containing protein 39 (Myosin-interacting M-band-associated stress-responsive protein) (Myomasp)
GeneName	LRRC39 UNQ6500/PRO21368
Length	339
Function	Component of the sarcomeric M-band which plays a role in myocyte response to biomechanical stress. May regulate expression of other M-band proteins via an SRF-dependent pathway. Important for normal contractile function in heart.
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasm; Myofibril; Sarcomere; M line
